name: grain headband
notes:
the grain headband features a textured slip-stitch pattern, that is really easy to work.

the headband is knitted flat with chunky yarn, making it a quick-to-knit project. you can knit this headband in a couple of hours.

the edges of the finished headband are seamed together forming a twist.

it's a one-skein knitting project. the gauge is not really important for this project, and the pattern width/length are easily adjustable.

enjoy!
